extends java.lang.Object

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns a negative number if black is winning and positive if white is winning.
        Returns:
        (-1)*(number of black pieces)+(number of white pieces)

      • gameIsOver

        public boolean gameIsOver()
        Returns whether game is over or not. According to the Reversi rules, game is over if both players do not have any legal moves left.
        Specified by:
        gameIsOver in interface Game
        Returns:
        is this game over

        protected List<java.lang.Object> getMoves(boolean cache)

        Parameters:

        legal moves in this game situation

      • move

        public boolean move(int x,
                    int y)
        Makes the suggested move and changes turn if it is legal; returns whether the move is legal.
        Parameters:
        x - is the row number of the move
        y - is the column number of the move
        Returns:
        true if move is legal, false if not
